node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 男患者居於太古城明宮閣高層，無外遊紀錄。他在 2 月 7 日發燒，向私家醫生求診，之後出現咳嗽徵狀。 2 月 10 日到東區醫院急症室求醫，當時照 X 光片肺部清晰。2 月 13 日患者再向私家醫生覆診。 2 月15 日他再因發燒到該院急症室求醫，當時因出現肺炎病徵，被送到監察病房，隨後證實對新型冠狀病毒初步呈陽性反應，被送到隔離病房進一步檢驗，情況穩定。患者妻子於 2 月 8 日都有流鼻水、咳嗽等病徵，2 月 16 日已安排她入住東區醫院。2 人病發前後都曾到筲箕灣一間小型教堂聚會。
node.detail_en: The male patient lives in Ming Kung Mansion of Taikoo Shing. He has no travel history. He developed fever on Feb 7 and visited a private clinic. He later developed a cough and sought treatment at the A&E of Pamela Youde Nethersole Eastern Hospital on Feb 10 where his chest/lung X-ray came back clear. He consulted a private doctor again on Feb 13. He went to the A & E again on Feb 15 with symptoms of pneumonia, was sent to an observation ward and later diagnosed with COVID-19. The patient's wife started showing symptoms such as a runny nose and coughs on Feb 8 and was admitted to Pamela Youde Nethersole Eastern Hospital on Feb 16. Both this patient and his wife had attended a small church gathering in Shau Kei Wan before displaying symptoms.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 群組首名確診者為巴馬丹拿集團（P&T Group）工程師，及後其同事、妻子及岳父岳母均證實確診。
groups.description_en: The first confirmed case is an engineer of P&T Group, whose colleagues, wife and parents-in-law were all diagnosed positive to the coronavirus.

node.location_zh: 太古城道 22 號太古城明宫閣
node.location_en: Ming Kung Mansion, Taikoo Shing, 22 Taikoo Shing Road
node.remarks_en: Developed fever and cough on Feb 7

node.location_zh: 太古城高志輝醫生診所
node.location_en: Dr. Ko Chi Fai William, Taikoo Shing
node.remarks_zh: 曾 4 次到訪該診所，其中 2 月 10 及 15 日因患者發燒所以醫生沒為患者看病並轉介患者到急症室，2 月 13 日因患者沒發燒故有為患者看病
node.remarks_en: The patient visited the clinic four times.  He could not see the doctor on Feb 10 and Feb 15 and was referred to the Accident & Emergency Department for fever. He consulted the doctor on Feb 13 as he did not have fever at that time.

node.location_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院急症室
基督門徒福音會西灣河分會
node.location_en: Christian Gospel Disciples Church (Sai Wan Ho Branch)
node.remarks_zh: 與妻子（第 60 宗患者）參與聚會
node.remarks_en: Attended gatherings with his wife (patient no.60)

node.remarks_zh: 與第 59 宗患者為不同樓層的同事，平日會見面及討論工作
node.remarks_en: Co-worker of patient no.59 whose work station is located on different floor; will meet and work together

node.remarks_zh: 與同事（第 59 宗患者）出席會議
node.remarks_en: Attended a meeting with a co-worker (patient no. 59)

node.remarks_zh: 到訪其岳父母（第 63 及 66 宗患者）於屯門的寓所
node.remarks_en: Visited the home of his parents-in-law (patients no. 63 and 66) in Tuen Mun
